review: There is good and bad. But let me say I'm new at this. I love the size. Anyone can hook this up. The remote is great so simple. Love the voice search. What I dont like is hard to find prime movies. What I hate is I have a kindle fire hdx8.9 that I play the walking dead on. Could not wait to play on my box. So I found I had to have a game controller to play. So I got the game controller. Went to play. Then I found I had to start all over again. It will not pick up were I left off on my kindle. Thats is odd ( I THINK) I called amazon they had no clue why. So I have to have two different games going one on my box one on my kindle. Not to happy about that. The other thing is my mirroring only works if I do a total restart with my kindle. Every time to get it to my tv. I find it to be more trouble than its worth. I have used mayday over this also. But still have to do the hold botton for 40 sec restart the. Mirror.
author: Tammy

review: Works fine, although had some trouble getting it set up on my TV and then more trouble going from Fire back to cable but finally mastered it.  Downside is 3 remotes now, TV, cable and Fire; didn't have to use the TV remote before Fire.  I recommend this as I will be dropping the premium cable channels and saving lots of money.
